participant_1.name: Alex Turner
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and strategic, enjoys challenges and problem-solving.
participant_1.background: i'm single and with two dogs. i don't drink alcohol. i like to play chess. i am in my thirties.

participant_2.name: Samantha Reed
participant_2.personality: creative and playful, has a passion for collecting unique items.
participant_2.background: my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream.
